title: several urdf models appear to be missing head link

content.raw:
in `atlas_description/urdf`


```
#!bash

atlas_original_inertia.urdf
atlas_simple_shapes_original_inertia.urdf
atlas_simple_shapes.urdf
atlas.urdf
atlas_v3.urdf
atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia.urdf
```


all seem to be missing `head` links.

I couldn't figure out the history exactly, but I found a few clues in two different branches

In `sandia_hand_integration` This commit appears to have moved it out to `atlas.sensors`

* #!/osrf/drcsim/commits/eaf9ee5e809f766afe74020490fbced42f6ba9a7

In `catkin` this commit appears to have moved files in mass, but does not appear to include `atlas.sensors`

* #!/osrf/drcsim/commits/a944a85c056db44c08e25d9bbd6e11c053dd4108
